pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sati karaṇīye senaṃ gantvā atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.5: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṃ, ye mayaṃ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā senāya paṭivasāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.9: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.15: “Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṃ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari vaseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.1.1: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.1.6: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.1: Atirekatiratte atirekasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.2: Atirekatiratte vematiko senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.3: Atirekatiratte ūnakasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.3.4: dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
